p: To investigate the interaction of OA-10 with HA, we studied the affinities of OA-10 with HA by surface plasmon resonance (SPR). A recombinant HA protein from virus strain A/Vietnam/1203/2004 (H5N1) was used as representative HA of H5N1 IAV strains, because the amino acid sequence identity of the full-length HA proteins between A/Vietnam/1203/2004 strain and A/Duck/Guangdong/99(H5N1) strain used in above antiviral assay was 97.0% ( Supplementary Material 5) [ 35]. As shown in Figure 5B, OA-10 interacted with HA in a dose-dependent manner, and the equilibrium dissociation constant (KD) of the interaction was 2.98 × 10 −12 M, indicating a strong affinity between OA-10 with HA. OA-10 did not interact with negative control protein FKBP12 (FK506 binding protein 1A, 12 kDa), indicating that interactions of HA with OA-10 were specific [ 36]. This result indicates that HA is most likely the target of OA-10 by which it inhibits virus entry and subsequent replication.
